articles.title: India, Pakistan tackle backslide in child immunizations - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: India and other South Asian countries must deal with a dangerous backslide in routine infant vaccinations during 2019—2021 brought on by the COVID-19 pandemic and restrictions imposed to counter its spread, say UNICEF officials.

articles.title: Former 76ers Player Signing With New Team - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Former Seton Hall star Myles Powell is signing with the Bay Area Dragons in the East Asia Super League. Powell has played for the Philadelphia 76ers, and also been with the New York Knicks organization.
